api.errors.ApiMethodNotYetImplementedErr: This API method is not yet implemented.
api.errors.GenericApiError: An error occurred, please try again later.
api.errors.NotEnoughMoneyToSendError: Not enough ADA to make this transaction.
api.errors.ReportRequestError: There was a problem sending the support request.
api.errors.WalletAlreadyImportedError: The wallet you are trying to import already exists.
api.errors.WalletAlreadyRestoredError: The wallet you are trying to restore already exists.
api.errors.WalletFileImportError: Wallet could not be imported. Please make sure you are providing the correct file.
api.errors.checkAdressesInUseApiError: Error received from server while checking used addresses.
api.errors.currentCoinPriceError: Current coin price data not available now.
api.errors.discoverAddressesError: Error received from API method call while discovering addresses.
api.errors.getAccountStateApiError: Error received from server while getting account state.
api.errors.getAddressesWithFundsError: Error while getting addresses with funds.
api.errors.getAllUTXOsForAddressesError: Error received from api method call while getting UTxOs.
api.errors.getBestBlockApiError: Error received from server while getting best block.
api.errors.getPoolInfoApiError: Error received from server while getting pool info.
api.errors.getReputationError: Error received from server while getting reputation.
api.errors.getRewardHistoryApiError: Error received from server while getting reward history.
api.errors.getTxHistoryForAddressesApiEr: Error received from server while getting transactions.
api.errors.getTxsBodiesForUTXOsApiError: Error received from server while getting TxBodies.
api.errors.getTxsBodiesForUTXOsError: Error received from api method call while getting TxBodies.
api.errors.getUtxosForAddressesApiError: Error received from server while getting UTxOs.
api.errors.getUtxosSumsForAddressesApiEr: Error received from server while getting balance.
api.errors.histoicalCoinPriceError: Historical coin price data not available now.
api.errors.noInputsError: The wallet restored from your recovery phrase is empty. Please check your recovery phrase and attempt restoration again.
api.errors.sendTransactionApiError: Error received from server while sending transaction.
api.errors.sendTransactionError: Error received from api method call while sending transaction.
api.errors.serverStatusError: Connection to the server failed. Please check your internet connection or our Twitter account (https://twitter.com/YoroiWallet).
api.errors.unusedAddressesError: You cannot generate more than 20 consecutive unused addresses.
api.errors.updateAdaTxsHistoryError: Error while updating Ada transactions history.
app.errors.storageLoadError: Failed to access storage. Yoroi needs to access to storage ("IndexedDB") to properly manage wallets. Your browser may either not support IndexedDB or it may be disabled due to your privacy settings (such as private browsing)
daedalusTransfer.error.noTransferTxError: There is no transaction to be sent.
daedalusTransfer.errorPage.title.label: Unable to restore Daedalus wallet.
daedalusTransfer.form.instructions.step0: Enter the 12-word recovery phrase used to back up your Daedalus wallet to restore the balance and transfer all the funds from Daedalus to Yoroi.
Enter the unencrypted master key for your Daedalus wallet to restore the balance and transfer all the funds from Daedalus to Yoroi.
Enter the 27-word recovery phrase used to back up your Daedalus Paper wallet to restore the balance and transfer all the funds from Daedalus to Yoroi.
daedalusTransfer.waiting.title.label: Daedalus wallet is being restored
daedalusTransfer.waiting.warning: This may take a long time or fail on poor internet connections
global.errors.invalidMasterKey: Invalid master key entered, please check.
global.errors.invalidPaperPassword: Paper Wallet password requires at least 10 characters.
global.errors.invalidWalletName: Wallet name requires at least 1 and at most 40 letters.
global.errors.invalidWalletPassword: Spending password requires at least 10 characters.
global.passwordInstructionsPaperWallet: Note: Paper Wallet password needs to be at least 10 characters long.
global.staleTxnWarningLine1: Your wallet has changed since you created this transaction.
global.staleTxnWarningLine2: You can still send this transaction but it may fail.
global.uriExplanation: These allow you to easily share invoices with friends and businesses by simply clicking a URL.
inline.editing.input.cancel.label: cancel
inline.editing.input.change.label: change
maintenance.screen.explanation: Yoroi is in maintenance mode. You can still access your funds through any other wallet software.
maintenance.screen.title: Temporary Maintenance
networkError.label.message:
WARNING: Connection to the server failed.
Please check your internet connection or our Twitter account.
The displayed balance and transaction history may appear incorrect until our servers are back to normal, but your actual balance is not affected.
noticeBoard.noNoticeText.chooseAPool: To view notifications here, first choose a stake pool and delegate your ADA.
noticeBoard.noNoticeText.notDelegatedYet: You have not delegated a stake yet.
noticeBoard.notice.costChanged.subMessag: Old cost was {oldCost} {currency} and new cost is {newCost} {currency}
noticeBoard.notice.costChanged.title: Stake pool cost has changed
noticeBoard.notice.feeChanged.subMessage: Old fee was {oldFee} {currency} and new fee is {newFee} {currency}
noticeBoard.notice.feeChanged.title: Stake pool fee has changed
noticeBoard.notice.noRewardForUndelegati: As two epochs ago you have undelegated from everything
You have not received any rewards for passed epoch
noticeBoard.notice.poolToRetire.subMessa: To continue getting rewards you can delegate your stake to other pool
noticeBoard.notice.poolToRetire.title: Stake pool [{poolTicker}] is planning to retire
noticeBoard.notice.rewardRecieved.subMes: You have received {rewardAmount} {currency} as rewards for epoch {epochNumber}
noticeBoard.notice.rewardRecieved.title: Rewards have been received
noticeBoard.notice.stakeDelegated.subMes: You will start getting rewards from next epoch
noticeBoard.notice.stakeDelegated.title: You have delegated to the pool [{poolTicker}]
noticeBoard.notice.stakeRedelegated.subM: Rewards for next two epochs will still be received from pool [{poolTicker}]
noticeBoard.notice.stakeRedelegated.titl: You have re-delegated to another pool [{poolTicker}]
noticeBoard.notice.stakeUndelegated.subM: Rewards for next two epochs will still be received
noticeBoard.notice.stakeUndelegated.titl: You have undelegated from the pool [{poolTicker}]
noticeBoard.topbar.title: Notification
notprod.label.message: WARNING: non-production build. If unexpected, double-check Yoroi installation.
profile.languageSelect.intro: You are on the Yoroi Shelley Testnet
profile.languageSelect.title: Language Select
profile.nightly.header: Yoroi Nightly automatically updates nightly with the latest in-progress features. Although we will never intentionally push bugs or broken code, features may still be in-progress or contain errors.
profile.nightly.recommendation1: You only use wallets with a small amount of ADA to minimize risk.
profile.nightly.recommendation2: You report any issues to EMURGO through the Yoroi Nightly channel.
profile.nightly.title: Yoroi Nightly
profile.nightly.warning1: Yoroi Nightly does NOT operate on a mock blockchain or test server.
profile.nightly.warning2: Any transactions you send will be visible on-chain and in production servers.
profile.nightly.warningHeader: In order to simulate a production environment:
profile.termsOfUse.checkboxLabel: I agree with the terms of use
profile.termsOfUse.title: Terms Of Use
profile.uriPrompt.form.explanation: Do you want to enable Cardano payment URLs?
profile.uriSkip.descriptionLine1: Although you will not be able to use payment URLs, you will still be able to generate them.
profile.uriSkip.descriptionLine2: You can enable this feature any time in the settings menu.
serverError.label.message:
WARNING: Server experiencing difficulties.
Please check our Twitter account.
The displayed balance and transaction history may appear incorrect until our servers are back to normal, but your actual balance is not affected.
settings.display.blog: You can read our {blogLink} on how to use this feature.
settings.externalStorage.intro: Select an external storage service to connect your account and save your memo notes.
settings.externalStorage.title: Connect an account
settings.general.aboutYoroi.label: About Yoroi
settings.general.languageSelect.info: For EMURGO, friendliness in Yoroi is an important topic. We believe understanding blockchain concepts is easier in your native language. We try supporting as many languages as possible, but for a broader selection of languages we need to accept the help from community translators. The selected language translation is fully provided by the community.
settings.general.languageSelect.labelInf: The selected language translation is fully provided by the community
settings.general.translation.acknowledgm: Thank you to the following for their contribution:
settings.menu.externalStorage.link.label: Memo Storage
settings.menu.general.link.label: General
settings.menu.paperWallet.link.label: Paper Wallet
settings.menu.support.link.label: Support / Logs
settings.menu.termsOfUse.link.label: Terms of use
settings.menu.wallet.link.label: Wallet
settings.noexternal.dialog.content: Your memos are stored locally. They will not automatically sync with other Yoroi instances and will be lost if you delete Yoroi
settings.noexternal.dialog.title: No external storage
settings.paperWallet.createPaper.label: Create Paper Wallet
Your paper wallet PDF is ready
settings.paperWallet.dialog.finalize.int: to keep the paper document and secret words safe.
to remember the password, or write it down and keep it safe!
settings.paperWallet.dialog.password.int: Yoroi Paper Wallets are encrypted with a password.
You must have it to restore your funds!
It is your own responsibility to make sure you remember it.
settings.paperWallet.dialog.verify.messa: This is the final step. Please verify the mnemonic phrase (printed on the PDF certificate) and the password to make sure you have all the valid information to *access your funds later*. On the next screen you will also be able to verify the account checksum and copy your new addresses.
settings.paperWallet.printIdentification: Enabling this will help you verify your wallet at the moment of restoration, but it will also **forfeit plausible deniability**.
settings.support.faq.content: If you are experiencing issues, please see the {faqLink} for guidance on known issues.
settings.support.faq.title: Frequently asked questions
settings.support.logs.content: If you want to inspect logs, you can {downloadLogsLink}. Logs do not contain sensitive information, and it would be helpful to attach them to problem reports to help the team investigate the issue you are experiencing.
settings.support.logs.title: Logs
settings.support.reportProblem.content: If the FAQ does not solve the issue you are experiencing, please use our {supportRequestLink} feature.
settings.support.reportProblem.title: Reporting a problem
settings.unitOfAccount.label: Currency
settings.unitOfAccount.note: Note: coin price is approximate and may not match the price of any given trading platform. Any transactions based on these price approximates are done at your own risk.
settings.unitOfAccount.title: Currency Conversion
testnet.label.message: WARNING: This is a {network} network. ADA has no monetary value here. For more information, check out the FAQ at {faqLink}
transfer.form.instructions.step1.text: It will take about 1 minute to restore your balance. In the next step, you will be presented with a transaction that will move all of your funds. Please review the details of the transaction carefully. You will need to pay a standard transaction fee on the Cardano network to make the transaction.
transfer.form.masterkey.input.label: Master key
transfer.form.masterkey.requirement: Note: master keys are 192 characters and hexadecimal-encoded
transfer.instructions.attention.legacy: Legacy wallets created during the Byron-era (before November 29th, 2019) can no longer be used. However, you can transfer your legacy funds to your current wallet to access your funds.
transfer.instructions.hardware.disclaime: I acknowledge that entering my hardware wallet's recovery phrase carries significant risk.

When you originally setup your hardware wallet, you were asked to write down a recovery phrase on a piece of paper. Entering this phrase will allow you to transfer your funds out of your hardware wallet and into the current wallet.
If you use this feature, you should generate a new recovery phrase for your hardware wallet. If you don't know why or how to do this, we do not recommend you use this feature.
transfer.instructions.instructions.text:
Before you can transfer funds, you must create a Yoroi wallet and back it up.
Upon completion, you will receive a 15-word recovery phrase which can be used to restore your Yoroi wallet at any time.
transfer.instructions.instructions.title: Instructions
transfer.legacy.daedalus.title: Legacy Daedalus Wallet
transfer.legacy.icarus.title: Icarus/Yoroi Wallet
transfer.summary.addressFrom.label: From
transfer.summary.addressTo.label: To
transfer.summary.finalBalance.label: Final balance
transfer.summary.recoveredBalance.label: Recovered balance
transfer.summary.transactionFee.label: Transaction fees
transfer.summary.transferButton.label: Transfer Funds
uri.display.dialog.title: Generated URL
uri.display.dialog.usabilityWarning: This link can only be opened by users with Yoroi installed on their browser
uri.generate.dialog.address.label: Receiver address
uri.generate.dialog.amount.label: Amount ({currency})
uri.generate.dialog.confirm.label: Generate
uri.generate.dialog.title: Generate URL
uri.invalid.dialog.title: Invalid URL
uri.invalid.dialog.warning.text1: The link you clicked is invalid.
uri.invalid.dialog.warning.text2: Please ask the receiver to double-check the format.
uri.landing.dialog.confirm.label: I understand
uri.landing.dialog.title: Perform a transaction from a Cardano URL
uri.landing.dialog.warning.line2: You are on Yoroi's official extension.
uri.landing.dialog.warning.line3: You are not being victim of a phishing or man-in-the-middle attack.
uri.verify.dialog.address.label: Receiver address
uri.verify.dialog.text: Before continuing, make sure the transaction details are correct.
uri.verify.dialog.title: Transaction details
wallet.add.optionDialog.connect.hw.ledge: A Ledger hardware wallet is a small USB device that adds an extra level of security to your wallet. It is more secure because your private key never leaves the hardware wallet. This protects your funds even if your computer is compromised due to malware, phishing attempts, etc.
wallet.add.optionDialog.connect.hw.trezo: A Trezor hardware wallet is a small USB device that adds an extra level of security to your wallet. It is more secure because your private key never leaves the hardware wallet. This protects your funds even if your computer is compromised due to malware, phishing attempts, etc.
wallet.add.optionDialog.restore.normalWa: If you have a Yoroi recovery phrase consisting of 15 words generated when you created a Yoroi Wallet, choose this option to restore your wallet.
wallet.add.optionDialog.restore.paperWal: If you have generated a Yoroi paper wallet (which is usually printed and kept offline), you can choose this option to import the funds from your Yoroi paper wallet.
wallet.add.page.create.title: Create wallet
wallet.add.page.create.tooltip:
Generate a new 15-word recovery phrase
and create a Yoroi wallet.
wallet.add.page.daedalusTransfer.title: Transfer funds from a Daedalus wallet to Yoroi
wallet.add.page.daedalusTransfer.tooltip:
You can transfer funds from a Daedalus wallet
to Yoroi, but first you will need to create
a Yoroi wallet to store those funds.
wallet.add.page.hw.title: Connect to  hardware wallet
wallet.add.page.hw.tooltip:
Create or restore a Yoroi wallet
using a Ledger or Trezor hardware wallet.
wallet.add.page.restore.title: Restore wallet
wallet.add.page.restore.tooltip:
Enter a 15-word recovery phrase
to restore an already-existing Yoroi wallet,
or import an existing Yoroi paper wallet.
wallet.add.page.subtitle.label: Yoroi light wallet for Cardano
wallet.add.page.title:
Your gateway
to the
financial world
wallet.backup.dialog.legacy.checkConfirm: Do you want to check if your wallet needs to be upgraded?
wallet.backup.dialog.legacy.explanation:
If you had any ADA in your wallet on November 29th, 2019
    you have to upgrade your wallet to a Shelley "reward wallet".
wallet.backup.privacy.warning.dialog.che: Make sure nobody looks into your screen unless you want them to have access to your funds.
wallet.backup.privacy.warning.dialog.rec: On the following screen, you will see a set of 15 random words. This is your wallet backup phrase. It can be entered in any version of Yoroi in order to back up or restore your wallet’s funds and private key.
wallet.backup.recovery.phrase.display.di:
Please, make sure you have carefully written down your recovery phrase somewhere safe.
    You will need this phrase to use and restore your wallet. Phrase is case sensitive.
wallet.backup.recovery.phrase.entry.dial: I understand that my secret keys are held securely on this device only, not on the company's servers.

I understand that if this application is moved to another device or deleted, my money can
    be only recovered with the backup phrase that I have written down and saved in a secure place.
Tap each word in the correct order to verify your recovery phrase
wallet.connect.hw.dialog.step.about.prer: Your computer must remain connected to the Internet throughout the process.
wallet.connect.hw.dialog.step.connect.in: This process shares the Cardano public key with Yoroi.
wallet.connect.hw.dialog.step.save.error: Failed to save. Please check your Internet connection and retry.
wallet.connect.hw.dialog.step.save.label: SAVE
wallet.connect.ledger.dialog.common.step: Click here to learn more about using Yoroi with Ledger
Cardano ADA app must be installed on the Ledger device.
Cardano ADA app must remain open on the Ledger device.
The Ledger device must remain connected to your computer throughout the process.
wallet.connect.ledger.dialog.step.connec: After connecting your Ledger device to your computer's USB port, press the Connect button.
Make sure Cardano ADA app is open on the Ledger device.
wallet.connect.ledger.dialog.step.save.w: Set a wallet name of your choice.
wallet.connect.ledger.dialog.title.label: CONNECT TO LEDGER HARDWARE WALLET
wallet.connect.ledger.error.101: Failed to connect. Please check your ledger device and retry.
wallet.connect.trezor.dialog.common.step: Click here to learn more about using Yoroi with Trezor
The Trezor device must be pre-initialized.
The Trezor device screen must be unlocked.
The Trezor device must remain connected to your computer throughout the process.
wallet.connect.trezor.dialog.step.connec: After connecting your Trezor device to your computer, press the Connect button.
A new tab will appear. Please follow the instructions in the new tab.
wallet.connect.trezor.dialog.step.save.w: We have fetched the Trezor device’s name for you. You can use as it is, or assign a different name.
wallet.connect.trezor.dialog.title.label: CONNECT TO TREZOR HARDWARE WALLET
wallet.connect.trezor.error.101: Failed to connect trezor.io. Please check your Internet connection and retry.
wallet.create.dialog.name.label: Wallet name
wallet.create.dialog.title: Create wallet
wallet.dashboard.empty.text: Go to Simple or Advance Staking to choose what stake pool you want to delegate in. Note, you may delegate only to one stake pool in this Tesnnet
wallet.dashboard.empty.title: You have not delegated your ADA yet
wallet.dashboard.epochTooltip: Note: only the first reward after delegating will take 2 epochs. Afterwards, rewards come every epoch
wallet.dashboard.lessthan.header: There are many reasons why you could be getting less rewards than you expected. We list some common ones here
wallet.dashboard.lessthan.reason1: A stake pool you are delegating to either was or is offline so it did not make any blocks
wallet.dashboard.lessthan.reason2: Not enough time has passed since you delegated
wallet.dashboard.lessthan.reason3: The amount earned was rounded down to 0 (if you delegated a very small amount)
wallet.dashboard.lessthan.reason4: A stake pool you are delegating to charges a flat fee greater than the pool's total reward
wallet.dashboard.lessthan.reason5: A stake pool you are delegating to was or is saturated
wallet.dashboard.lessthan.title: Missing Reward Explanation
wallet.dashboard.poolWarnings.censoringT: Purposely excludes transactions from blocks (censoring the network)
wallet.dashboard.poolWarnings.explanatio: Unlike Proof of Work (PoW) where users cannot do anything about adversarial behavior, Proof of Stake (PoS) blockchains like Cardano empower users to punish bad actors
wallet.dashboard.poolWarnings.header: Based on network activity, it seems this pool:
wallet.dashboard.poolWarnings.multiBlock: Creates multiple blocks in the same slot (purposely causing forks)
wallet.dashboard.poolWarnings.suggested: We suggest contacting the pool owner through the stake pool's webpage to ask about their behavior. Remember, you can change your delegation at any time without any interruptions in rewards.
wallet.dashboard.poolWarnings.unknown: Causes some unknown issue (look online for more info)
wallet.dashboard.stakePool.title: Stake Pool Delegated
wallet.dashboard.summary.mangled.line1: Your wallet has {adaAmount} ADA with a different delegation preferences.
wallet.dashboard.summary.mangled.line2: We recommend to {transactionMessage} to delegate the ADA
wallet.dashboard.summary.title: Your Summary
wallet.dashboard.upcomingRewards.noRewar: no rewards will be earned on this epoch
wallet.dashboard.upcomingRewards.title: Upcoming Rewards
wallet.dashboard.warning.pendingTx: Staking dashboard information will update once your pending transaction is confirmed
wallet.delegation.transaction.approximat: Current approximation of rewards that you will receive per epoch:
wallet.delegation.transaction.explanatio: You can only delegate to one stake pool at a time
You can switch to delegate to a different stake pool at any time
You can cancel your delegation at any time
wallet.delegation.transaction.success.ex: Track the status of the stake pool and the amount of time remaining to receive a reward from the Dashboard page
wallet.hw.common.error.101: Necessary permissions were not granted by the user. Please retry.
wallet.hw.ledger.common.error.103: Ledger device is locked, please unlock it and retry.
wallet.hw.ledger.common.error.105: Network error. Please check your internet connection.
wallet.nowallet.subtitle: Please choose a wallet from the top-right dropdown
wallet.nowallet.title: No wallet selected
wallet.receive.page.internalWarning1: Internal addresses (or "change" addresses) maintain your privacy by obscuring which addresses belong to you on the blockchain
wallet.receive.page.internalWarning2: addresses are shown here for personal auditing purposes and should never be used.
wallet.receive.page.mangledWarning1: Mangled addresses contribute to your ADA balance but have the incorrect delegation preference
wallet.receive.page.walletReceiveInstruc:
Share this wallet address to receive payments.
To protect your privacy, new addresses are generated automatically once you use them.
wallet.restore.dialog.passwordDisclaimer: Typing the wrong wallet password will give you a different wallet. This allows for plausible deniability.
wallet.restore.dialog.title.label: Restore wallet
wallet.restore.dialog.title.paper.label: Restore Yoroi Paper wallet
wallet.restore.dialog.title.verify.label: Verify Yoroi wallet
wallet.restore.dialog.upgrade.noop: Your wallet did not need to be upgraded
wallet.restore.dialog.verify.intro.line2: Make sure account checksum and icon match what you remember.
wallet.restore.dialog.verify.intro.line3: Make sure addresses match what you remember.
wallet.restore.dialog.verify.intro.line4: If you've entered wrong mnemonics or a wrong paper wallet password - you will just open another empty wallet with wrong account checksum and wrong addresses.
wallet.restore.dialog.verify.title: Verify Restored Wallet
wallet.send.confirmationDialog.title: Confirm transaction
wallet.send.form.cannotSendToLegacy: You cannot send to legacy addresses (any address created before November 29th, 2019)
wallet.send.form.description.hint: You can add a message if you want
wallet.send.form.description.label: Description
wallet.send.form.errors.invalidTitle: Please enter a title with at least 3 characters.
wallet.send.form.receiver.label: Receiver
wallet.send.form.sendingIsDisabled: Cannot send a new transaction while an existing one is still pending.
wallet.send.form.title.label: Title
wallet.send.form.transactionFeeError: Not enough Ada for fees. Try sending a smaller amount.
wallet.send.ledger.confirmationDialog.in: After connecting your Ledger device to your computer's USB port, press the Send using Ledger button.
Make sure the Cardano ADA app remains open on the Ledger device throughout the process.
wallet.send.trezor.confirmationDialog.in: After connecting your Trezor device to your computer, press the Send using Trezor button.
A new tab will appear. Please follow the instructions in the new tab.
wallet.send.trezor.error.101: Signing cancelled on Trezor device. Please retry
wallet.settings.delete.accept: I still have the means to restore this wallet
wallet.settings.delete.warning2: Please double-check you still have the means to restore access to this wallet. If you cannot, removing the wallet may result in irreversible loss of funds.
wallet.settings.name.label: Wallet name
wallet.settings.remove.explanation: Removing a wallet does not affect the wallet balance. Your wallet can be restored again at any time.
wallet.settings.remove.label: Remove wallet
wallet.settings.resync.explanation: If you are experiencing issues with your wallet, or think you have an incorrect balance or transaction history, you can delete the local data stored by Yoroi and resync with the blockchain.
wallet.settings.resync.label: Resync wallet with the blockchain
wallet.settings.resync.warning: This will also cause failed transactions to disappear as they are not stored on the blockchain.
wallet.staking.warning.pendingTx: You cannot change your delegation preference while a transaction is pending
wallet.staking.warning.title: Delegation temporarily disabled
wallet.summary.page.ledgerNanoSWalletInt: You have successfully integrated with your Ledger Nano S device
wallet.summary.page.trezorTWalletIntegra: You have successfully integrated with your Trezor Model T device
wallet.summary.page.walletCreatedNotific: You have successfully created a new Wallet
wallet.summary.page.walletRestoredNotifi: You have successfully restored your Wallet
wallet.transaction.export.dialog.infoTex: The entire transaction history within your wallet will be exported to a file.
wallet.transaction.export.dialog.title: Export transactions to file
wallet.transaction.memo.delete.dialog.co:
Are you sure you want to remove the memo for this transaction?
Doing so will erase all copies of it and you will not be able to restore it in the future.
wallet.transaction.memo.invalid: Memo must be at least 1 and at most {maxMemo} characters.
wallet.transaction.memo.optional.invalid: Memo cannot be more than {maxMemo} characters.
wallet.transfer.instruction: Any ADA claimed will be transfered to your currently selected wallet
wallet.undelegation.transaction.explanat: You do NOT need to undelegate before switching stake pools
It will take 2 epochs after the end of the current epoch for undelegation to take effect
yoroiTransfer.error.noTransferTxError: There is no transfer transaction to send.
yoroiTransfer.error.walletChangedError: The wallet has changed. Please re-confirm your transaction.
yoroiTransfer.errorPage.title.label: Unable to transfer from another wallet
yoroiTransfer.form.instructions.step0.te: Enter the 15-word recovery phrase used to back up your other wallet to restore the balance and transfer all the funds to current wallet.
yoroiTransfer.form.instructions.step0Pap: Enter the 21-word recovery phrase used to back up your Yoroi Paper wallet and your paper password to restore the balance and transfer all the funds.
yoroiTransfer.successPage.title: success
yoroiTransfer.waiting.title.label: Wallet is being restored
